description: McKay-Thompson series of class 30c for Monster.
comments: G.f. A(x)=y satisfies 0=f(A(x)^2/x,A(x^2)^2/x^2) where f(u,v) = u^3 + v^3 - 4uv(u+v) - 9uv - (uv)^2. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 26 2004Euler transform of period 15 sequence [ -1,-1,0,-1,-2,0,-1,-1,0,-2,-1,0,-1,-1,0,...]. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 26 2004Expansion of q^(1/2)(eta(q)eta(q^5))/(eta(q^3)eta(q^15)) in powers of q. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 26 2004
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = (QP[q]*QP[q^5])/(QP[q^3]*QP[q^15]) + O[q]^60; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 13 2015, adapted from PARI *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
